files.title: 20.5.1. Architecture
files.summary: ### 20.5.1. Architecture[](#architecture-6-x "Permalink to this headline")  An SM consists of:  * 64 (compute capability 6.0) or 128 (6.1 and 6.2) CUDA cores for arithmetic operations, * 16 (6.0) or ...

files.title: 20.5.2. Global Memory
files.summary: ### 20.5.2. Global Memory[](#global-memory-6-x "Permalink to this headline")  Global memory behaves the same way as in devices of compute capability 5.x (See [Global Memory](#global-memory-5-x))....
